website_summaries.verdict: Good, no-frills option for people on a budget. Makes a good replacement chair.
pros: Easy to adjust the height on the fly
cons: Lacks the advance adjustment settings of other executive chairs

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: we ordered a total of 3 of these chairs for the office. ALL of these chairs have issues with the wheels. I am not sure what the issue is other than when you try to actually move in the chair you almost flip over because the bottom half of the chair is working against the top half. There is a flaw somewhere in the rolling mechanisms. for this reason i would not recomend the purchase of these chairs. They all need to be replaced. They are comfy is the only reason it has two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Curley

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair. It is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair. It is very comfortable. It goes up and down easily. It does not tilt back but is still very comfortable. I found it very easy to put together with the included allen wrench. Edit: It does allow you to lean back by pulling the lever out.
customer_reviews.author: JqbuckleyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic chair
customer_reviews.text: Nice basic chair, was easy to assemble metal base and casters are good. Some things you should know, it makes your butt sweat not as high as a normal exec high back, a bit narrow in the seat. Still over all it is a good serviceable chair that should last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please buy a different chair from a different company, and make sure they stand behind the products they sell.  60 Day warranty
customer_reviews.text: I figured from the other reviews that this would be a decent chair, The chair worked for about 3 months, and started to tilt a little from side to side, so it was hard to stay balanced, I figured it was just the chair breaking itself in, actually about a month later, the lift mechanism started to fail, it would just go all the way down to the floor, I tried to contact the company, but was told they only stand behind their products for 60 days....I wonder why, stay away, stay far away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Chair --  Bad Arm rests
customer_reviews.text: So I have had these chairs for a year now and the covering on the arm rests has worn thru and staples are protruding up thru them.. very uncomforatable. The wheel base is ok, unless you have a teenager who likes to lean way back when the chair is int he upright locked position, then the wheel arms bend and it is hard to push back to get up. This only happened to one, But both suffer from cheap arm rests covers and staples popping up. I have since recovered with real cowhide to cover the staples.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was not sent this chair for a review i bought it myself. The chair came quickly and it was very easy to build. the chair is comfortable and it is worth the price. I send a lot of time in the chair and i haven't had any issues with it. You wont be falling asleep in the chair but you wont have back pain
customer_reviews.author: Lori B

customer_reviews.title: Decent Initially Then Falls Apart Due To Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews, but this chair is trash. The screws work themselves loose even after extreme tightening, the padding starts to wear pretty quickly, and the chair's back leans far too much backward and puts undue stress on the cheap plastic in the arms (along with those aforementioned screws) so that it's beginning to fall apart after only a couple months of use. I'm not a big person either, 175 pounds and 5' 11" so it's not like I'm putting too much stress on the thing. It just sucks. Spend more the first time and get something worth having or have to replace it again in a few months and spend even more cash, the choice is yours.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyddrich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and smooth. Does not mark up my floor.
customer_reviews.author: jessaquiler

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not even a year that I use it and there are cracks and rips on the chair. Do not expect to last for more than 2 years. I better invest in something more expensive next time that can last a few years. My previous chair lasted for at least 5 years with no rips and another 5 with a few rips.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pulaj

customer_reviews.title: Horrible chair.
customer_reviews.text: Bad chair hard to assemble, it came with 2 right arms instead of a left and a right I needed a chair that day for my office so I didn’t bother sending it back but it has got worse over time; I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: An excellent chair for the price. Have had it for a few months now, & there have been NO changes in the original quality whatsoever. (and I am very rough on things lol) Looks great, & is comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: K. Thacker

customer_reviews.title: although the chair (cushion's and arm rests) were comfortable the base of the chair is made of sub-standard ...
customer_reviews.text: although the chair (cushion's and arm rests) were comfortable the base of the chair is made of sub-standard (thin) metal and it literally broke apart in less than 3 months...as always you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: certain shopper

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The chair itself is pretty comfortable and looks nice but the quality is definitely lacking. I tend to lean to one side of the chair while sitting and after one month the chair is tilted in that direction. Now even if I try to sit up straight the chair is leaning. Also the base of the chair seems pretty week, I don't lean all the way back because if feels like the chair may go over. Over all this is probably just another "you get what you pay for" lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: The other Bad part about the chair is that the feet are ...
customer_reviews.text: My personal experience with this chair is that it is very hard the padding on the armrests are very thin and after about an hour of usage your back and butt will be very sore I suggest a different chair. The other Bad part about the chair is that the feet are thin metal and weak mine have twisted enabling the chair to fall over backwards the wheels no longer roll correctly. I highly recommend you pick a different chair.
customer_reviews.author: blaine virden

customer_reviews.title: Best choice black office chair
customer_reviews.text: What a deal. A very affordable office chair with free shipping! Easy assembly, looks great and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne VanS

customer_reviews.title: Comfy chair but the lock for back is funky
customer_reviews.text: All in all it is a good comfy chair for you to use as a desktop chair. My only big complaint is the lock that you have underneath the chair can be unreliable. I can have it locked and the chair doesn't tilt back as much, but if my back leans toward the chair, the lock can be loosed up and I would swing backward... Not a fun feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Pedestal to weak
customer_reviews.text: The seat looks and works great. The pedestal that holds the wheels and shock the metal is to weak. The arms started to Twist after 3 week's of use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and just working
customer_reviews.text: Sitting on it more than 4 hours a day. Very comfortable and just working.
customer_reviews.author: Siegfried

customer_reviews.title: Missing Screws!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t put chair together because I was missing all 8 of the screws to put it together. Ridiculous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: didn't supply the correct size bolts
customer_reviews.text: We ended up buying some fasteners in town to complete the chair. $5.00 extra, but finally completed the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Kanning

customer_reviews.title: Best choice!
customer_reviews.text: I am the general manager of a fast food establishment and this is the second chair I've purchased for the new store I am at. It's extremely reasonably priced and is just perfect! It's exactly the big, comfortable, squishy leather chair I was searching for, but did not want to spend the amount these chairs normally cost!
customer_reviews.author: Kortney

customer_reviews.title: comfortable chair, good upgrade, good for adulting.
customer_reviews.text: not bad chair, it's comfortable, easy to build. great buy for the $$$$
customer_reviews.author: Sovertop Tith

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever bought! First of all, it is a returned one, with all kinds of scratches, and not worth it at all. Returned already!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m jealous
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and my daughter loves it. Easy to put together and very comfortable. Now I wish I had one!
customer_reviews.author: Just an average customer

customer_reviews.title: Side to side wobble.
customer_reviews.text: Chair is comfortable. And was great until it started to develop a wobble from side to side a few months after using it. It is not too big of a deal but it is still annoying.If you are Interested in this chair I would recommend something else.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Bente

customer_reviews.title: Junk.  Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: The wheel base to this chair broke after 4 months. No longer under warranty. Very poorly made. I do not recommend and would leave negative stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Ordered for teenage son's room and he is very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Patricaann M. Pirog

customer_reviews.title: Love the chair, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair, but it did not come with all of the parts. The screws were the wrong size so I had to go to a hardware store and get new ones. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mary hebert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It was very easy to assemble and seems pretty sturdy... especially considering the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: The arm rests are pretty hard. Other than that the chair is decent
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. The arm rests are pretty hard. Other than that the chair is decent.
customer_reviews.author: KaboomOxyCln

customer_reviews.title: it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The arm rests need to be higher on the chair. Otherwise, it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Villing

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Realy nice chair for the price. I dont give 5 stars just for the little scratches in one side.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: It ok
customer_reviews.text: Will not slide right keeps trying to tip over on me lol but its ok other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Vapin clowds

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's not comfortable at all I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sirak T.

customer_reviews.title: Solid comfy chair.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is the perfect level of comfy, squishy, supportive, manipulative. I love it oh so much after a couple of months now and it's gotten me back into writing more.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Salazar

customer_reviews.title: The screw below the arm rest have started coming out ...
customer_reviews.text: The screw below the arm rest have started coming out and making the product unusable after around 4 month of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Bipul

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good chair but waaaay too easy to flip over when leaning back.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyen Jack

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! I have had this car for 2 months and the legs are already broken bent and the wheels do not work!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this chair for my secretary. Was easy to put together. So far she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Capt.  Klep

customer_reviews.title: I got this as a gift. In just a ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift. In just a month. Went to lean back and chair flipped over. Busted head and now 2 bent wheels. Just from leaning back in it. Absolutely furious.
customer_reviews.author: Marcye K Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we have ordered this many more times like this chair very much.
customer_reviews.author: Ikonika

customer_reviews.title: great chair. Bought two for our office
customer_reviews.text: great chair. Bought two for our office, then ended up ordering another one. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Giltner

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.text: The base bent on the first day, rolling chair across the office. Gave up and donated the chair, bought a new one locally that works better.
customer_reviews.author: The Tackle Room

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Offers great back support. A big difference from My old chair
customer_reviews.author: Alicia M Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality!
customer_reviews.text: Had it less than a year and the plastic arm broke off
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money - Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about two months. Wheels stopped spinning. Impossible to slide even on the tile.
customer_reviews.author: Lumos9

customer_reviews.title: Package was damanged upon arrival. I was not concerned ...
customer_reviews.text: Package was damanged upon arrival. I was not concerned about the box damage that much, but upon assembly, no screws or bolts were in the box!
customer_reviews.author: Bagels

customer_reviews.title: hydralic office chairs
customer_reviews.text: the hydralic cylinder wont keep the chair up, looses pressure from the getgo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky wheels
customer_reviews.text: The wheel's don't roll very smoothly. I have a hardwood floor and they keep getting stuck and just slide instead of rolling
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: WHICH IS
customer_reviews.text: in a couple of weeks the feets have beed bended I am 108 Kg which is 238 Lb and the Manufacturer guratees till 250 lb
customer_reviews.author: Sadik hakan guris

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This Chair was above and beyond my expectation. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JEDSEAHAWKE

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The left side arm crack and broke off the very first day
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Bennett

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Faux Leather Ergonomic High Back Executive Office Chair w/Rolling Base, Adjustable Height - Black
product_meta.description: Your workspace is ready for the executive treatment. A classic addition to any home or office, this ergonomically designed chair offers supportive comfort in a traditional, timeless style. Whether for work or play, this office chair will give 110%, just like you do. SPECIFICATIONS: Overall Dimensions: 30"(L) x 25"(W) x 41”-45“(H); Backrest: 26"(W) x 20"(H); Seat: 20.5"(W) x 20.5"(L); Armrest: 16.5” x 2.5”; Adjustable Height: 41" to 45"; Product Weight: 33.8 lbs.; Weight Capacity: 250 lbs.; Color: Black; Material: PU Leather; Frame Material: Steel; Assembly required (instructions included);
feature_bullets: ERGONOMIC DESIGN: The tall curved backrest and sloped armrests provide optimal comfort while you work or game, and a rolling base with casters
DURABLE, HIGH-QUALITY STYLE: Made with sleek, easy-to-clean faux leather and a durable steel frame
ADJUSTABLE SEAT: Rolling base, 360-degree swivel, and a height adjustable seat (ranging from 41"- 45")
COMFORTABLE PADDING: The backrest and seat are filled with a soft layer of quality padding for a relaxing experience
OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 30"(L) x 25"(W) x 41"-45"(H); Weight Capacity: 250 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars112 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
